2.5.0.en:
• Changed driver model, updated app settings UI
• Added support for Auriol HG05124A-DCF-TX (Auriol v2)
• Stricter timing to improve reception
• Removed Oregon Scientific v2.2 (sensors need re-pairing)
• Removed Labs, moved into Alecto v1

2.5.2.en:
• Changed driver model, updated app settings UI
• Added support for Auriol HG05124A-DCF-TX (Auriol v2)
• Added support for Alecto WS-1700
• Fixed wind speed for Alecto, Cresta & Oregon Scientific
• Stricter timing to improve reception
• Removed Oregon Scientific v2.2 (sensors need re-pairing)
• Removed Labs, moved into Alecto v1

3.0.0.en: Converted to SDK v3 by Marius Gundersen
3.0.0.pl: Przekonwertowano do SDK v3 przez Mariusa Gundersena

3.1.0.en:
• Added repair capability
• Made FineOffset separate protocol within Alectov3 (needs re-pairing)
• Restructured code
• Fixed 'getStatistics'

3.2.0.en: Support for Ambient Weather protocol added by Damien Villeneuve
3.2.0.pl: Wsparcie dla protokołu Ambient Weather dodane przez Damiena Villeneuve'a

3.2.1.en: Fix temperature issue for Cresta wind sensor
3.2.1.pl: Naprawiono problem z temperaturą w czujniku wiatru Cresta
